metadata.name: E-commerce Demo
metadata.summary: Sample e-commerce data with customers, products, and orders
metadata.detailed_description: This content pack provides a realistic e-commerce scenario with customer data, product catalog, order history, and related files. Perfect for demonstrating database queries, data analysis, and business intelligence scenarios with AI agents.

database: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customers (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, first_name TEXT NOT NULL, last_name TEXT NOT NULL, email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, phone TEXT, address TEXT, city TEXT, country TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS categories (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL, description TEXT);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS products (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT NOT NULL, description TEXT, price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, category_id INTEGER, stock_quantity INTEGER DEFAULT 0, sku TEXT UNIQUE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS orders (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, customer_id INTEGER NOT NULL, order_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status TEXT DEFAULT 'pending', total_amount DECIMAL(10,2), shipping_address TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS order_items (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, order_id INTEGER NOT NULL, product_id INTEGER NOT NULL, quantity INTEGER NOT NULL, unit_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders (id), FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products (id));

prompts.name: explore_ecommerce_data
prompts.description: Initial exploration of the e-commerce database
prompts.content: You have access to an e-commerce database with customers, products, orders, and categories. Please explore the database structure and provide a summary of what data is available. Start by listing all tables and their relationships.

prompts.name: sales_analysis
prompts.content: Analyze the sales data in the e-commerce database. Calculate total revenue, identify best-selling products, analyze customer purchasing patterns, and provide insights about the business performance.

prompts.name: inventory_management
prompts.description: Review inventory levels and stock management
prompts.content: Review the current inventory levels for all products. Identify products that are low in stock, calculate inventory value, and suggest which products might need restocking based on sales patterns.

prompts.name: customer_insights
prompts.content: Analyze the customer data to understand purchasing behavior, geographic distribution, and customer value. Identify your most valuable customers and suggest strategies for customer retention.

children.name: business_overview.md
children.content:
# E-commerce Business Overview

## Company: TechStyle Store

A modern e-commerce platform specializing in electronics, clothing, books, and home goods.

### Key Metrics (Current Period)
- Total Customers: 4
- Total Products: 5
- Active Orders: 3
- Categories: 4

### Business Goals
1. Increase customer retention
2. Optimize inventory management
3. Expand product catalog
4. Improve order fulfillment speed

### Recent Initiatives
- Launched new smartphone product line
- Expanded international shipping to UK
- Implemented customer loyalty program
- Added garden tools category

inbox.subject: Order Confirmation - Thank You!
inbox.body: Hi! I just wanted to say thank you for the quick delivery of my smartphone and t-shirt order. The packaging was excellent and everything arrived in perfect condition. I'll definitely be ordering again soon!

inbox.subject: Weekly Inventory Alert
inbox.body:
Weekly inventory summary:

- All products currently above reorder threshold
- Smartphone Pro showing strong sales velocity
- Garden Tool Set new addition performing well
- Consider expanding electronics category based on demand

Next review scheduled for next Monday.

inbox.subject: Question about wireless headphones
inbox.body: I received my wireless headphones yesterday and they're great! I'm wondering if you have any other audio accessories that would pair well with them? Maybe a carrying case or additional cables?

sent.subject: Re: Order Confirmation - Thank You!
sent.body:
Dear Alice,

Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you're happy with your order and our service. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.

As a valued customer, you'll be the first to know about our upcoming product launches and special offers. Keep an eye on your inbox!

Best regards,
TechStyle Customer Service Team

drafts.subject: Re: Question about wireless headphones
drafts.body:
Dear Bob,

Thank you for your question about audio accessories! We're excited to let you know that we're currently expanding our electronics category and will be adding premium carrying cases and high-quality audio cables in the coming weeks.

Would you like us to notify you when these items become available?

[DRAFT - Need to check with inventory team about timeline]

key_insights: High customer satisfaction based on feedback
Inventory levels healthy across all categories
